name: Reflections (itch) (Jayometric)
description:
Reflections was made for the HQ Residential House jam. 

A small mirror puzzle game with 4 endings based on the actions taken at the end of the game. 

Around 10 minutes for the first playthrough. Around 3 minutes after knowing the steps. 

Controls: 
Move: WASD 
Open Doors: Look toward handles and press E
Use Light Switches:  Look at switch and press E
Swing Hammer: Left Click
Pause: P
Put Away Note: E
